data.title: Shenzhen Bay Club – International Associate Clubs
data.text:
Shenzhen Bay Club is located at the prestigious One Shenzhen Bay complex, with a panoramic view of the serene Deep Bay area. It is the first international private membership club in Shenzhen, China.

With proximity to the Shenzhen Bay Port, Hong Kong-Shenzhen Western Corridor, and Houhai CBD, the Club will connect the elites of Hong Kong, Macau and the Pearl River Delta. It will become the hub of an area where heavy weight PRC and Fortune 500 enterprises consolidate top talent.

Situated on the waterfront, Shenzhen Bay Club enjoys both the natural beauty of a bay view and spectacular cityscape. Embraced by fifteen kilometers of waterfront a peaceful promenade and a beautiful lagoon. While located in the middle of the metropolitan area, it also offers an unprecedented experience for the members.

Please ensure that you make your booking at least 24 hours in advance to give the Club sufficient amount of time to prepare.

Amenities

To its Members, Shenzhen Bay Club provides comprehensive amenities with international standards. A Café, a Member’s Lounge, and a Bar for relaxation and social gathering; a Board Room and a Co-Working Area are for meetings and working outside of the office.

Members and guests are not allowed to take photograph or live broadcast for commercial and communication purposes without Shenzhen Bay Club's permission. All images and text of One Shenzhen Bay and Shenzhen Bay Club must be used with official written authorization by Shenzhen Bay Club.

More Information

Additional Charges

A guest fee of RMB 300 per person per day will be charged for any non-members using the facilities in Fitness Center.

The swimming pool is open to Members only.

Parking

Limited parking for club Members is provided in the designated car park on a " First Come First Serve" basis, club also provides free parking for 4 hours for Members. Parking is for Member's use whilst enjoying club facilities only.
